scenes.background: Bob crosses his arms, glancing at Alex and then you.
scenes.description: Bob says, 'Milestones are good, but we can't neglect the details. What's your take?'

options.text: I think setting clear milestones will help us balance speed and thoroughness.
options.analysis: You advocate for a balanced approach, showing good self-regulation and social skills by aiming for both speed and thoroughness.

options.text: While milestones are important, let's not forget to double-check our work at each stage.
options.analysis: You emphasize the importance of double-checking work, showing empathy and motivation for achieving a thorough outcome.

options.text: Milestones are fine, but we should prioritize getting things done quickly and fix issues as they arise.
options.analysis: You prioritize speed, showing good perception of urgency but lower empathy towards the need for thoroughness.
